text: - Instructure is a company that produces

educational technology
platforms to solve the challenge

of online learning and
being able to bring learning
to the environment, to the home,

to outside of the classroom,
to really be able to teach
and develop the whole learner.
We created a learning management system
to start called Canvas.

That platform enables
teachers and institutions

to upload content to interact
and collaborate with students

and to promote learning
in an online environment.

We then subsequently
created video platform

that allows for interactive
video to be able
to be incorporated into those classes.
We've also extended into portfolios

and assessment technologies
as well all leveraging AWS

and all really driving home
the idea of student success
in the online environment.
We chose to build our solution on AWS

and continue to run
our technologies on AWS
because of the proven reliability,
scalability, security behind AWS.
Being able to bring the experiences

of people around the
world to the classroom,

all of that can be done
in an online environment.

And our platforms have
enabled that in such a way

that we've really hopefully,
encouraged transformation
in the educational experience.
